nodes.text: Helen Sadler is an English actress based in Los Angeles. She voiced Surro in Star Wars: The Old Republic, Rey in LEGO Star Wars: The Resistance Rises, and Jyn Erso in Star Wars Battlefront. She also voiced Rey in the beta version of Star Wars Battlefront II.
